notes:
1. The Fire Tetrahedron

For a fire to occur, four elements must be present at the same time. Removing any one of these elements will extinguish the fire.

  • Fuel: Any combustible material (solid, liquid, or gas).
  • Heat: An ignition source to raise the fuel to its ignition temperature.
  • Oxygen: The oxidizer, usually from the air.
  • Chemical Chain Reaction: The self-sustaining process of combustion.

2. Classes of Fire

Fires are classified based on the type of fuel that is burning. This is important for selecting the correct type of fire extinguisher.

  • Class A: Ordinary combustibles like wood, paper, cloth, and plastics.
  • Class B: Flammable liquids like gasoline, oil, and grease, and flammable gases.
  • Class C: Energized electrical equipment.
  • Class D: Combustible metals like magnesium, titanium, and sodium.
  • Class K: Cooking oils and fats in commercial cooking equipment.

3. Types of Fire Extinguishers

  • Water (APW): For Class A fires only. Cools the fuel.
  • Carbon Dioxide (CO₂): For Class B and C fires. Displaces oxygen and cools the fuel.
  • Dry Chemical (ABC or BC): Multipurpose (ABC) extinguishers are effective on Class A, B, and C fires. They work by interrupting the chemical chain reaction.
  • Wet Chemical: For Class K fires. Forms a soap-like barrier to prevent re-ignition.
  • Dry Powder: For Class D fires only. Smothers the fire.

solvedExamples.question: A fire involving live electrical equipment is classified as what class of fire?
solvedExamples.explanation: Class C fires are those involving energized electrical equipment. Using a conductive extinguishing agent like water would be extremely dangerous due to the risk of electric shock.

solvedExamples.question: Which type of fire extinguisher is the most versatile and can be used on ordinary combustibles, flammable liquids, and electrical fires?
solvedExamples.explanation: An ABC-rated dry chemical extinguisher is a multipurpose extinguisher effective against the three most common classes of fire (A, B, and C), making it a common choice for general-purpose use.
